events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but I want to request a refund because the size was incorrect and it doesn't fit at all.
The customer's issue has been categorized under Refund due to their request for money back on a purchased product.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah J. who specializes in refund requests and returns.
Hello! My name is Sarah, and I’m here to help you with your refund request for the jacket you purchased.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been opened or worn so we can process your refund?
Thank you for responding quickly. The order number is 783452, and I have not worn the jacket; it’s still in its original packaging.
We have initiated your refund process. Please ship the jacket back to us using the prepaid return label we will send you shortly.
That sounds great, thank you for handling this so efficiently. I appreciate the prepaid label for returns.
The refund request has been finalized, and you will receive the refund once the jacket is returned and inspected.
Checking in to confirm you received the prepaid label and to ask if you need any further assistance with the refund.
Yes, I received the label and have already sent the jacket back. Thanks again for your help!
The case has been closed successfully after confirming the refund was processed and the jacket return completed.
A customer satisfaction survey was sent to gather feedback on the refund and support experience with our team.
